name: Prisoners' Dilemma
description:
There are two prisoners joined at hips who have opposite motivations. These prisoners have escaped prison. Control both of these characters and meet both their needs to survive for as long as possible. Made during the 48 hours of GMTK Game Jam 2021. Original Submission Here: https://shubhamitabh.itch.io/prisoners-dilemma

Team:

  • Shubhankar Amitabh
  • Souporno Ghosh
  • Noyonika Saha
